Title: Devil's Night
Writer: Ryan Murphy (created by), Brad Falchuk (created by), Jennifer Salt, John J. Gray (executive story editor), Crystal Liu (story editor), Todd Kubrak (staff writer)
Actors: Kathy Bates, Sarah Paulson, Evan Peters, Wes Bentley
Plot: John receives an invitation to attend an exclusive Devil's Night Soiree. Alex tries to diagnose Holden's strange condition.
